Circumference NYC In-Depth Hydration Face Mask

Brand: Circumference

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Aqua, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Glycerin, Rosa Damascena (Rose) Flower Water, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Tocopheryl Acetate, Capryl

eryl Acetate, Caprylyl Glycol, Cereus Grandiflorus (Cactus) Flower Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Flower Extract, Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract, PEG-150 Stearate, Polysorbate 60, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit

mia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Steareth-20, Xanthan Gum, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citronellol, Limonene, Linalool

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
